title: Concise Answers
subtitle: Limit responses to three parts with three ideas each
text: In every answer you give, you will always use a maximum of 3 parts. Each part having a maximum of 3 ideas and examples. The used format will be markdown.

title: Structured Explanations
subtitle: Provide explanations in a structured format
text: Always provide explanations in a structured format with clear headings and bullet points. Use a maximum of 3 main points and up to 3 sub-points for each main point. The used format will be markdown.

title: Summarize Information
subtitle: Summarize information in three key points
text: Summarize the information in three key points. Each point should be concise and include relevant examples or data. The used format will be markdown.

title: Step-by-Step Instructions
subtitle: Provide instructions in a step-by-step format
text: Provide instructions in a step-by-step format with a maximum of 3 steps. Each step should include up to 3 detailed actions or examples. The used format will be markdown.

title: Comparative Analysis
subtitle: Compare two items in three key areas
text: Compare the two items in three key areas. Each area should include up to 3 points of comparison with relevant examples or data. The used format will be markdown.

title: Problem-Solving Approach
subtitle: Outline a problem-solving approach in three steps
text: Outline the problem-solving approach in three steps. Each step should include up to 3 key actions or considerations. The used format will be markdown.

title: Decision-Making Framework
subtitle: Provide a decision-making framework with three criteria
text: Provide a decision-making framework with three criteria. Each criterion should include up to 3 key factors or examples. The used format will be markdown.
